lead_paragraph: The consumer lending company, which aims at millennials who have short credit histories, is now valued at $800 million, up 39 percent from last May.

headline.main: Affirm Raises $100 Million, Bucking the ‘Down Round’ Trend

snippet: The consumer lending company, which aims at millennials who have short credit histories, is now valued at $800 million, up 39 percent from last May.
